page.title: 05DAIRY FARMING
page.content: Dairy farming is a very big industry in this area. Nowadays most people have electric milking machines. Most milking machines can milk four cows at once. The first thing you have to do is fetch the cows up from the field. Then you put them a building ready to be milked.Then the cows go into the milking parlour to be milked.Then you put units on the cow's udder.The units suck the milk out of the cow.Then the milk goes through a pipe to another parlour.Then it goes through a cleaning process then into a tank.For sixty cows it takes about one and a half hours.Every morning a milk tanker comes and takes the milk to Bamber Bridge and it is sold as cheese, butter or just as nice cold milk.Some people in Catforth have their own dairies and sell their own milk.
